headline: Ask HN: Trying to figure out if this company is related to Y Combinator?
description:
I can't find any mention of curve.fi (a DeFi DAO/company that specializes in efficient stablecoin trading) on the list of companies [0] but they had submit a hiring thread to ycombinator [1] back in 2021.

Is curve.fi backed or somehow related to ycombinator or can anybody post a hiring thread to HN?

[0] https://www.ycombinator.com/companies?query=curve

[1] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=25887724
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 试图弄清楚这家公司是否与Y Combinator有关？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 試圖弄清楚這家公司是否與Y Combinator有關？
description_zh-Hans:
我在公司名单[0]上找不到任何关于curve.fi（一家专门从事高效稳定币交易的DeFi DAO/公司）的信息，但他们早在2021年就向ycombinator[1]提交了招聘信息。

curve.fi是否得到ycombinator的支持或与之有某种关系，或者有人能向HN发布招聘信息？

[0] https://www.ycombinator.com/companies?query=curve

<1] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=25887724
description_zh-Hant:
我在公司名單[0]上找不到任何關於curve.fi（一家專門從事高效穩定幣交易的DeFi DAO/公司）的信息，但他們早在2021年就向ycombinator[1]提交了招聘信息。

curve.fi是否得到ycombinator的支持或與之有某種關係，或者有人能向HN發佈招聘信息？

[0] https://www.ycombinator.com/companies?query=curve

<1] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=25887724
